__e: Demanding that I come here, putting everything at risk?

I have often thought that in the hereafter of our lives when I owe no more to the future and can be just a man that we may meet and you will come to me and claim me yours and know that I am your husband.
Told him it was a waste of time, insisted he come home.
It took a lot of nerve to lie there waiting for them.
You had to have balls to go near her, and I did.
It took courage to face me after what I said the other day.
As hard as it may be for you to understand, that did not require any feelings on my part.
You thought he demanded it and knew what you had done.
Inspector... we need to talk about these long hours, you and me under the law.
It took all the skill that I had just to bring some reality to the moment.
Well, I think it's obvious that you really connected with this part.
It took a lot for him to come here and tell you that.
To drive away the evil spirits which the dead represented. Once again I ask myself
They made a lot of demands, even more threats.
It just took a good friend to help me find mine.
! Do you know the men who I've had to sacrifice to get here?
But when he got sick, you can bet I asked why, I demanded to know why.
So glad you insisted on being a part of the plan. Couldn't have pulled it off without your talent.
